text.intro:
This is an overview of the textual networks of the Mālikī scholarly community of Qayrawān. 
The orange nodes represents BOOKS authored or transmitted by the scholars of Qayrawan. The rest of the colours
 represent scholars according to 4 historical periods: Early Aghlabid period (dark blue), Later Aghlabid period (turqoise)
Early Fatimid period (light green) and Fatimid-Zirid period (dark green). Other scholars, whose  works have nott been included
are represented with red nodes.

Source: Muḥammad b. Ḥārith al-Khushanī, Ṭabaqāt ʿUlamā al-Qayrawān
text.title: Textual Communities of Qayrawān: 800-1050 CE
